name: Oblong Industries, Inc.
description: Oblong Industries, Inc. is an innovative technology company that specializes in spatial computing and collaboration solutions. Founded in 2006, Oblong aims to transform the way people interact with digital information and devices, focusing on creating immersive and intuitive experiences. The company's flagship product, Mezzanine, is a platform designed for advanced video conferencing and collaboration, enabling users to share and manipulate digital content across multiple screens in real time. Oblong's technology is built on its patented gestural interface, which allows users to control content using natural hand movements, enhancing productivity and creativity in both corporate and educational environments. With a commitment to pushing the boundaries of technology, Oblong is at the forefront of designing solutions that cater to the evolving needs of remote work and digital collaboration. The company is dedicated to enhancing teamwork and communication through innovative technology, making it a leader in the burgeoning field of spatial computing.
